content.html: This is an immediate unfollow and block from me. I am the parent of an intellectually disabled child, and this term is a cheap, nasty, childish, ableist slur that is used to denigrate children like mine. I will never follow anyone who revels in it, like this:
content.value:
This is an immediate unfollow and block from me. 

I am the parent of an intellectually disabled child, and this term is a cheap, nasty, childish, ableist slur that is used to denigrate children like mine. 

I will never follow anyone who revels in it, like this:
